div.style: width:300px; margin:40px auto; background:white; padding:20px; border-radius:8px; box-shadow:0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);

input.name: username
input.style: width:100%; padding:10px; margin-bottom:16px; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:4px;

input.name: password
input.style: width:100%; padding:10px; margin-bottom:20px; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:4px;

button.style: width:100%; padding:10px; background:#3182ce; color:white; border:none; border-radius:4px; font-weight:bold;
